attributes.action: Stop the sale of alcohol in small corner shops and limit licenses to larger establishments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many small store owners sell alcohol to under age drinkers who then wreak havoc in the local community. If alcohol licenses were restricted to supermarkets or maybe one or two off licenses per postcode area, the sale of alcohol can be easily monitored. This would reduce under-age drinking and improve community life and the health of our youth.
